title: 2026’s Biggest AI Trends: Self-Driving Cars | TSLA Stock, GOOGL Stock, UBER Stock, NVDA Stock
summary: 24/7 Wall St. Analysts Eric Bleeker and Austin Smith are kicking the New Year off in style with 12 trends for AI investors to watch in 2026. Over the course of 12 videos, the two will share their thoughts on everything from the memory explosion to software stocks to robotics. In this video, Eric and Austin focus on recent developments in self-driving cars. Specifically, NVIDIA just launched its new Alpamayo suite of self-driving models. That move serves as a level of validation to Tesla's vision-only strategy, but also could create more competition for Tesla as well. Eric and Austin also look at the growth rate of Waymo's ridership in 2026.

raw.headline: 2026’s Biggest AI Trends: Self-Driving Cars | TSLA Stock, GOOGL Stock, UBER Stock, NVDA Stock

Eric and Austin also look at the growth rate of Waymo's ridership in 2026.

title: Electric Vehicles Today - Design Drives Consumer Choices in Modern Vehicle Purchases
summary: Recent research from Escalent reveals that while the electric vehicle (EV) industry has traditionally prioritized specifications like range and charging performance, consumer preference for design is a more significant motivator for battery electric vehicle (BEV) purchases. The study highlights that both interior and exterior vehicle design now overshadow traditional specs as primary reasons for choosing a BEV, with 71% of buyers prioritizing design in their decision-making process. Findings...
